# count_params

## Count the total number of scalars composing the weights.

## Description
 Count the total number of scalars composing the weights. 


## Usage
```r
 
count_params(object) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| object | Layer or model object |



## Value
 An integer count
